Package solvers

Title: solvers
The following package holds all classes related to the solvers of the Binary Puzzle Assistant (BPA).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BacktrackListener
    An interface ment to be used by a backtracker to generate solutions
    Strategy
    The strategy interface, it allows for a cell to be applied a certain strategy which will then give back all the actions required to apply said strategy.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Backtracker
    The backtracker class implements a backtracker which solves a given grid
    ContradictionStrategy
    A concrete strategy of the Strategy interface, this strategy contains the ability to apply a contradiction strategy to a given cell
    DecoratorStrategy
    A decorator strategy finds an empty cell to which a given strategy applies
    LineStrategy
    A concrete strategy of the Strategy interface, this strategy contains the ability to apply a line strategy to a given cell
    RecursiveDecoratorStrategy
    A decorator strategy that repeatedly finds a strategy to apply to an empty cell until no further changes occur
    TripletStrategy
    A concrete strategy of the Strategy interface, this strategy contains the ability to apply a triplet strategy to a given cell

Package solvers Description

Title: solvers
The following package holds all classes related to the solvers of the Binary Puzzle Assistant (BPA). Clas(ses) involved:
  • BacktrackListener
  • Backtracker
  • ContradictionStrategy
  • DecoratorStrategy
  • LineStrategy
  • RecursiveDecoratorStrategy
  • Strategy
  • TripletStrategy
Functionality:
  • A BacktrackListener interface. It provides a setup for an Observer Design Pattern related to the backtracker
  • A Backtracker class which uses backtracking and applies strategies to find all/a solution to a given puzzle.
  • A ContradictionStrategy class which implements the interface strategy. It tries to fill up a cell by contradiction.
  • A DecoratorStrategy class which uses a set of strategies to try and resolve an empty Cell in a given Grid.
  • A LineStrategy class which implements the interface strategy. It tries to fill up a cell by following the line constriction.
  • A RecursiveDecoratorStrategy class which uses a set of strategies to try and resolve all empty Cells in a given Grid.
  • An Strategy interface which tries to fill up a cell by a certain strategy.
  • A TripletStrategy class which implements the interface strategy. It tries to fill up a cell by following the triplet constriction.
